txt.en: You have arrived at Thurûm, and it is crawling with Dourhands. These foes are surely organized, and pose a dire threat to Othrikar.
You have arrived at Thurûm, and it is crawling with Dourhands. These foes are surely organized, and pose a dire threat to Othrikar.
Thurûm is north of Othrikar.\n\nYou should search Thurûm for the source of the Dourhand presence, and defeat the leader of this rabble.

'You defeated Torfi Hammerhorn? Truly? This is welcome news for us Longbeards! Long have we suffered the oppression of those loutish Dourhands, and we do not wish to suffer it again.\n\n'You have done us a noble service, my friend. The Longbeards of Othrikar will long remember your name!'
Find and defeat the leader of the Dourhands
Hannar is at Othrikar.\n\nTorfi Hammerhorn perished during the battle at his camp, routing his forces. You should return to Hannar with news of your victory.
'Torfi Hammerhorn's attack against Othrikar must be stopped at its source!'
'Welcome back, [placeholder]! Your defeat of Torfi Hammerhorn will live long in Longbeard memories!'
'There you are, my good [placeholder]! The Dwarves of Othrikar are ever at your service!'
Thurûm is north of Othrikar.\n\nYou should search Thurûm for the source of the Dourhand presence, and defeat the leader of this rabble.
